javax.swing.plaf.metal

Class MetalBumps

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalBumps
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Icon

     class MetalBumps
extends Object
implements Icon
    Implements the bumps used throughout the Metal Look and Feel.
    Author:
    Tom Santos, Steve Wilson

        public MetalBumps(int width,
          int height,
          Color newTopColor,
          Color newShadowColor,
          Color newBackColor)
        Creates MetalBumps of the specified size with the specified colors. If newBackColor is null, the background will be transparent.
